sentences.en: All this is intended to buy China's currency some respectability.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切意在给中国货币收买一些地位.

sentences.en: And who would provide the respectability?
sentences.cn: 那么,谁能提供这种体面 呢 ?

sentences.en: He began his professional life as an accountant, the very model of respectability and conservatism.
sentences.cn: 他开始了会计师的职业生涯，一份典型的体面而保守的工作。

sentences.en: He could shatter airs and " respectability " with deadly sarcasm.
sentences.cn: 他能以无情的讽刺来粉碎派头和 “ 体面 ”.

sentences.en: Her presence lent an air of respectability to the occasion.
sentences.cn: 她的到场使那种场合增添了崇高的气氛.

sentences.en: His super-clean image gave a veneer of respectability to the new professional set-up.
sentences.cn: 他超级整洁的形象使其新设的专业骗局看起来很正规很体面。

sentences.en: Just as honor is a prerequisite for respectability, so is unblemished character a barometer of integrity.
sentences.cn: 正如声誉是可敬的前提条件, 无暇疵的品格是正直的晴雨表.

sentences.en: Most UK bankers still want an air of respectability in banking.
sentences.cn: 大多数英国银行家仍然向往银行业那种高尚气氛.

sentences.en: Mr Sympson proved to be a man of spotless respectability.
sentences.cn: 辛普森先生原来就是一位无懈可击的体面人物.

sentences.en: The country has again achieved international respectability after years of isolation.
sentences.cn: 几年的孤立之后,该国又重新建立了国际声望.

sentences.en: The respect for respectability was stronger than any desire in Black Hawk youth.
sentences.cn: 黑鹰镇的年青人对身份和体面的尊重是比什么欲望都强烈.

sentences.en: The whole allegory is a consistent attack on morality and respectability.
sentences.cn: 整个寓言是对道德和有地位的人的有力抨击.

sentences.en: They were an old couple living on the margin of respectability.
sentences.cn: 他们是一对老夫妻,过着几乎是不太体面的日子.

sentences.en: To be shaved was a fashion of Florentine respectability.
sentences.cn: 刮脸是佛罗伦萨人体面的流行时式.

sentences.en: Wearing a tie was regarded as a badge of respectability.
sentences.cn: 打领带被视作是一种体面的标记.

words.tran_cn: 值得尊敬的；人格高尚的；相当数量的
相当好地；体面地；可敬地
体面；可尊敬；有社会地位
